title: ramaNIya yamunA taTAkam nandakumAran
sahitya:
ramaNIya yamunA taTAkam nandakumAran ughandu varu narumaNa malargaLum 
malarnda tiru brndAvanam iduvena aruL taru pErAnandam perum sukham


anupallavi

  kumudamO kamala mOhana mOhanamO amudamAnadu nANa accutanadu iccaippaDum 
ezhil paccait-taLir mEniyuDan angamellAm tazhuvip-pugLakam varu paramAnandam tarum azhagiya


caraNam    ovvoru tuLiyum engaL uttaman kathai pADum uraga kALiyanukkum uyara irundADum 
avvaLavAghiya abhinayangaL anga bhangamellAm sholli jatigaL pODum arangamO 
antarangamO kaLangamO niram kamazha kanakam Ekamadu nenjam nANittanjamAnadO
